verses.name: Mark 3:1
verses.text: And he entered again into the synagogue; and there was a man there which had a withered hand.

verses.name: Mark 3:2
verses.text: And they watched him, whether he would heal him on the sabbath day; that they might accuse him.

verses.name: Mark 3:3
verses.text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand, Stand forth.

verses.name: Mark 3:4
verses.text: And he saith unto them, Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days, or to do evil? to save life, or to kill? But they held their peace.
